name: Catastrophic Resonance
desc: If a character attacks while under Fighting Spirit, consumes HP equal to 10% of current HP and deals Additional DMG equal to 60% of the HP lost.
enhanced_desc: If a character attacks while under Fighting Spirit, consumes HP equal to 10% of current HP and deals Additional DMG equal to 60% of the HP lost. For each stack of Fighting Spirit, deals Additional DMG equal to 1% of the HP lost.
